channel.title: Spring JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPR-1675] Oracle code 61001 should be mapped to a ConcurrencyFailureException
item.description:
I think the correct sublcass is deadlockloserexception

Here's my stack trace:

com.spider.scoreboard.service.ServiceException: Unable to delete scorecard node 1386
at com.spider.scoreboard.service.impl.ScorecardTreeServiceImpl.deleteScorecardNode(ScorecardTreeServiceImpl.java:1477)

item.summary: Oracle code 61001 should be mapped to a ConcurrencyFailureException

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
3rd try's the charm, right? I was looking at the wrong numbers in my earlier posts. The code that should be mapped is 60, so I think we should be adding

<property name="deadlockLoserCodes">
<value>60</value>
</property>

to sql-error-codes.xml

Thanks for the hint! I've added 60 as deadlock loser code for Oracle now - according to your third attempt

Juergen
